cause.description:
For those of you who REALLY know me know that this cause is very important to me and has affected me greatly. Ill be posting more and more info once i have time about organ donation and what you can do to save lives.
--My dad received a liver transplant on 6/6/07 and has started his recovery to a new life.
--Go to http://www.cpadirectory.com/donatelife.cfm to become a registered organ donor in your state.
--Please invite friends.
--Donations go to the American Liver Foundation... for obvious reasons.
Thanks you guys!
1. SUPPORT ORGAN DONATION!!!
cause.name: Donate Life. Donate Love.
